column6:
A deadly mystery draws Kitty Pryde and her fire-breathing friend Lockheed from the Astonishing X-Men to the shores of Japan. Ninjas and dragons will be the least of their worries! Featuring art by legendary X-Men artist Paul Smith and written by Age of Apocolypse scribe Akira Yoshida!,2005,6
32 PGS./T+ Suggested for Teens and Up ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Paul Smith | colorist:Christina Strain | writer:Akira Yoshida
